Company: Compania Sud Americana de Vapores S.A.
Description: Compania Sud Americana de Vapores S.A. (CSAV), a Chilean corporation, agreed to plead guilty and to pay an $8.9 million criminal fine for its involvement in a conspiracy to fix prices, allocate customers and rig bids of international ocean shipping services for roll-on, roll-off cargo, such as cars and trucks, to and from the United States and elsewhere.

Company: Compania Sud Americana de Vapores S.A. (CSAV)
